channel.title: :: Xsoft v.2 - a New Beginning :: Need Developers ::
channel.description:
[u]I have permission from the owner of XSoft to post this post.[/u]
[i]Hello![/i]
The growing XSoft server, started by XSoft, is currently searching for people to hep develop and modify the server and web site. I may post a link, but it has to be approved first. XSoft has been running for approximately 2 months, and has been extremely succesful. Sadly, we need more recruits to sustain the growing population! Do not flame this thread.
Note this will be for VERSION 2!!
[ul][li]There will be 2 worlds. Free, and Premium. The premium world will be used to help pay for the 24/7 part of the server. We want to make the server all around better, with great features for both premium and free members! The site will also be featuring the Admin/Mod panel to be able to edit info/data from the server. Also it will be able to Run/stop the server.[/li][/ul]
If you wish to contact us add x s o f t on RS2 or contact xlorescape@hotmail.com (MSN) or aryana_xsoft@hotmail.com (MSN)
[table][tr][td][u][i]Curently Need:[/i][/u] 2 Coders 1 WebClient Coder[/table]
- Ary, Proud Admin of XSoft

item.title: :: Xsoft v.2 - a New Beginning :: Need Developers ::
item.dc:creator: @XSoft XSoft
item.description:
@XSoft wrote:

[quote=“dslayer40, post:33, topic:155758”]Position Wanted:Coder and Forums Maker
Msn-dslayer400@msn.com
aim-sdeamon40
email-trademan_tso@yahoo.com
Other contact info-trademan_tso
Java knowledge-I have been Java Coding since i was 8 years old. I have ran about 5 of my own successful servers and forums. I am a very mature player and user of many community’s and servers. I have been very successful in the position of Java Coding, In-game Moderation and Forum Moderation. I have been playing Runescape since i was 7 and been playing and coding Moparscape for about 2 years now. Before that i was very much into on-line forum Communities and i made on-line scrips and Java codes for them too. I am not very highly experienced with web design but more of the scripting part of websites.

Proof-Contact me and i will show you my work
Ever coded a server before-Yes
proof-Angel Scape Pkz(Contact me, a server i jst coded this morning. It is very bad at the moment for 2 hours of codding. Contact me to check it out)

I Added both of you on msn (dslayer400@hotmail.com)[/quote]

Accepted. (note, I don’t want people asking for ‘Admin’ or ‘Mod’ positions. First you earn it. Thanks)

Read full topic

Do you have any experience with adding webclients to the site? or maybe even coding them perhaps? (im xsoft)
[/quote]

I was too lazy to make my own so I used my friends. . This is mine though since I’ll be on the forums.

Edit: And no it’s not that hard. We are just adding new features to it such as log in/register on main page.
